summary: Mod adds to the game beautiful, comfortable house on a small rock near Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
The main hall
34 beds + double bed + 6 cots
2 hours for shields
90 bookshelves
All for crafting
Sanctuary
Stones Keepers

Master bedroom
Double bed
4 racks for weapons
20 bookshelves

Basement
193 racks for weapons
30 racks for boards
34 of the dummy

Outside
32 beds for planting
All for crafting

Requirements:
Version 1.9.32.0.8 or higher
DLC Dawnguard
DLC Dragonborn
Heathfire DLC


Installation:
standard

Removal:
delete the mod files from the Data folder.
author: Blacktea2014
